Row.Text: Greetings, all-seeing and fun-loving Caine of The Amazing Digital Circus! Long have your subjects trusted you to maintain their world of amusement and joy, great ringmaster. For many years, you have provided adventures and perils to keep the members of your digital circus from wandering into the dangerous Void. Despite your best efforts, your ungrateful subjects have escaped and found themselves in a dangerous world - a simulation of humanity's worst atrocities![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You have yet to find your lost circus members. Although Jax & Zooble may be strong-willed, Gangle & Ragatha are likely to be less helpful in combat. The group simply cannot compete with the likes of trained Spearmen and Knights! Although Kinger's ability to run and hide is unparalleled, and Pomni is probably handling this as well as you would expect.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Oh great & intelligent Caine, will you not come to the aid of your subjects? They're likely in panic, unsure what to do! Will you accept this responsibility, claim victory, and bring the gang home safe? Will you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?

Officially known in this world as the Cainic Empire, The Circus is short-hand for The Amazing Digital Circus. This computerised world is the homeland to various virtual characters. City names for the empire are decided by Caine's tried-and-tested Random Name Generator.

Feared by many and loved by few, Caine of the Amazing Digital Circus has entered the realm of Civilization V to seek his lost cast-members. Not many of Caine's powers from The Circus extend to this world. However, he was able to bring along his trusty companion Bubble, his many All-Seeing Eyes, and has the blueprint to The Tent memorised. Through rebuilding these miniature Digital Circuses he can harness his ability to summon NPCs, at least in a limited fashion.
Ringmaster of The Amazing Digital Circus
Thanks to your esteemed Bubble Chef, receive +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food from Pastures and +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food from Plantations.
Unparalleled in the art of reconnaissance, the All-Seeing Eye possesses a promotion that provides it +1 Sight. However, the unit is weaker and heals slower than the Scout, which it replaces.
The All-Seeing Eye is the Cainic unique unit, replacing the Scout. It provides +1 Sight, but it is weaker and healing is halved.

Summons two random land units which you have researched in this Era or the last. (From Renaissance Era onward, units granted will be from the Medieval Era). Does not require a [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horse or [ICON_RES_IVORY] Elephant to construct. Costs 30% more [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production (or 100% more [ICON_GOLD] Gold) than a standard Circus.
Reduces base healing from +10 to +5 per turn. An exclusive demotion for Cainic All-Seeing Eye.
